We will never pass terror attempts to intimidate our nation, to intimidate the state and to polarize society.
These treacherous attacks further consolidate the security of our security forces and the unity and co-existence of our nationality.
I condemn this humiliating attack against our country and our nationality, and I wish for the immediate healing of our wounded citizens.
